Row.Text: Argast takes his gold and turns his sights elsewhere. You have leveraged your vast wealth to redirect his wrath upon your enemies, ensuring your safety, at least for now.
Your {1_UnitName} ({2_Damage} damage) was raided by {3_UnitName: plural 2?; other?{3_UnitName: gender *:an?an; *:a?a; } ;}enemy {3_UnitName}.
Your {1_UnitName} ({2_Damage} damage) was injured by a nearby exploding {3_ImprovementName}.
Your {1_UnitName} ({2_Damage} damage) was caught in the blast from an exploding {3_ImprovementName}.
